/*input
1
5 9
1
1
*/
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace  std;
struct point
{
	long long int sum;
	long long int i;
};

bool cpm1(point a,point b)
{
	if(a.sum==b.sum)
		return a.i<b.i;
	return a.sum>b.sum;
}
int main()
{
	long long int n,s,m,q,k;
	scanf("%lld",&n);
	point a[n];
	for(long long int i=0;i<n;i++)
		scanf("%lld %lld",&s,&m),a[i].sum=s*m,a[i].i=i+1;
	sort(a,a+n,cpm1);
	scanf("%lld",&q);
	while(q--)
	{
		scanf("%lld",&k);
		printf("%lld\n",a[k-1].i);
	}
}
